name: Hive Beach coast path walk, Hive Beach

ai.summary: A short, easy 2.8 km coastal walk along Hive Beach, suitable for families and casual walkers, offering sea views and a flat, straightforward coastal track.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-defined coastal path with compact gravel and occasional sandy patches near the beach. Expect sea spray, possible wind, and some uneven spots near the edges.
ai.safety_notes: Check tide times before walking along coastal sections near the beach. Stay on marked paths and away from cliff edges. Wear sturdy footwear and dress for changeable UK weather. Bring a map or have a charged phone for navigation. Carry water and snacks and supervise children near the shoreline. Leave no trace and be mindful of other beach users.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation (or a charged phone)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal, with mild weather and good coastal views; summer offers beach access and longer daylight, but conditions can be windy.

seo.title: Hive Beach Coast Path Walk (2.8 km) – Easy Coastal Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the Hive Beach coast path walk, a 2.8 km easy coastal hike along the UK coastline. Enjoy sea views, flat terrain, and a quick coastal escape.
seo.h1: Hive Beach Coast Path Walk — 2.8 km Easy Coastal Hike
